name: Brandtrack, Inc.
description: Operator of a background music platform intended to help in creating and composing background music. The company's platform helps in managing the musicalization of multiple commercial spaces and is offered in conjunction with a personalized musical selection that seeks to enhance consumer experiences, enabling businesses to choose and compose background pieces of music while showcasing their products and attracting more customers.
